channel.title: Looking to start a RSC server
channel.description:
Hi! I'm looking to start my very first RSC server!! I just had a couple questions on everything:
1. Is there a large player base for RSC servers?
2. How hard is it to code RS2 vs. RSC?
3. What should my first source be for starting my first RSC server?

item.title: Looking to start a RSC server
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

  1. no
    2 rs2 harder
  2. easy rsc

Read full topic
item.source: Looking to start a RSC server
